ingredients.ingredient: 2 ½ cups creamy salad dressing (such as Miracle Whip®)
12 hard-boiled eggs, peeled and cut into 1/4-inch slices

cookingTips: Hard-boil eggs 10-12 minutes then cool immediately in ice water for easy peeling
Mix dressing components first to ensure even flavor distribution before adding eggs
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user to gently fold in the sliced eggs to maintain their shape and prevent the salad from becoming too chunky.
